This is my place to go when I want sushi.
Quick and friendly service, the owners are hardworking and really care for us guests.

I come here for lunch and sometimes dinner.

column7: Really nice and affordable Sushi place
column9: Good service, intermediate cost factor, and still very edible regular nigiri and maki portions. Not michelin star level though.

Very good sushi and other Japanese foods. Very out standing flavours. The apsolot best sushi I have tasted, and very nice workers.
It's worth going too.

The daily lunch offers not much choice, but what is available was very good. It was 2 nigiri and 8 maki of 2 different kind.

The sushi is amazing here. I highly recommend this place if you want quality for a reasonable price!
Went with the family on vacation in Lund. Excelent Sushi, fresh and nicely presented. Can recomend for familys.
